main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Pittsfield, Maine on 3 March 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as fluid-white and diamond-shaped, the size of a basketball at arm's length, It gave off bright lights that increased and decreased in intensity, The estimated altitude of the object was about 1000 ft, No sound was observed during the sighting, The case was concluded to possibly be a balloon, satellite, aircraft, or astronomical in nature.
witness description: Not specified, but involved observation of the object.
